All Classes

Class Description
Action
Contains the enum values of the actions a user can perform on the Main Menu and promotions list.
BaseController
Contains methods shared by Menu and Promo controller classes.
BaseCRUD
Contains methods shared by Menu and Promo boundary classes.
BaseModel
Template for Menu and Promo classes with constructor, ID attribute and ID getter.
Creatable
For the Menu and Promo classes to allow the user to create a menu or promotion item.
Deletable
For the Menu and Promo classes to allow the user to delete a menu or promotion item.
EmptyFieldException
Contains the exception EmptyFieldException.
FailReadException
Contains the exception FailReadException.
FailWriteException
Contains the exception FailWriteException.
InputValidator
Validates user inputs in Menu and Promo classes.
Invoice
Contains the attributes and methods belonging to invoices.
InvoiceController
Contains the methods to save invoices and display invoices to the user.
InvoiceNotFound
Contains the exception InvoiceNotFound.
InvoiceUI
Displays the Invoice UI when the user selects Invoice in the main UI.
Menu
Contains the attributes and methods belonging to menu items in the Main Menu.
MenuAlreadyExistsException
Contains the exception MenuAlreadyExistsException.
MenuController
Contains the methods to create, update, remove, get and save menu items.
MenuInPromoException
Contains the exception MenuInPromoException.
MenuNotFound
Contains the exception MenuNotFound.
MenuType
Contains enum values of the type of menu item.
MenuUI
Displays the Menu UI when the user selects Menu in the main UI.
NegativeNumberException
Contains the exception EmptyFieldException.
NoMenuException
Contains the exception NoMenuException.
Order
Contains the attributes and methods belonging to orders from different tables.
OrderController
Contains the methods to create, edit and display orders to the user.
OrderNotFound
Contains the exception OrderNotFound.
OrderUI
Displays the Order UI when the user selects Order in the Main UI.
Promo
Contains the attributes and methods belonging to promotion items.
PromoController
Contains the methods to create, update, remove, get and save promotion items.
PromoNotFoundException
Contains the exception PromoNotFoundException.
PromoUI
Displays the Promotion UI when the user selects Menu in the main UI.
Readable
For the Menu and Promo classes to allow the user to view a menu or promotion item.
Reservation
Contains the attributes and methods of the reservations made.
ReservationController
Contains the methods to create, remove and display reservations to the user.
ReservationNotFound
Contains the exception ReservationNotFound Occurs when the user tries to retrieve a reservation that does not exist.
ReservationUI
Displays the Reservation UI when the user selects Reservation in the main UI.
RevenueReportUI
Displays the Revenue Report UI when the user selects Revenue in the main UI.
RRPSSAppUI
Creates the table, reservation and invoice files in database package and displays the main UI of the application.
SerializeDB
Contains methods to create, read and write .dat files.
Table
Contains the attributes and methods belonging to all 30 tables.
TableController
Contains the methods to create, save and retrieve tables, check and display table status, and retrieve occupied and available tables.
TableNotFound
Contains the exception TableNotFound.
TableStatus
Contains enum values of the status of a table.
Updatable
For the Menu and Promo classes to allow the user to update a menu or promotion item.
